items.title: Cancer Concerns Spark Caution Over Weight-Loss Injections
items.description: A surge in queries about cancer and weight-loss drugs has led a leading UK charity to warn against their unregulated use. Medscape News UK

items.title: EMA Reviews Alcohol Dependency Drug After French Concerns
items.description: The European agency has started a review of sodium oxybate to assess its use to treat alcohol withdrawal syndrome and support long-term abstinence. Me...

items.title: Darzalex Monotherapy OK'd for Smoldering Multiple Myeloma
items.description: The EMA has extended the indications for Darzalex (daratumumab) to the treatment of adults at high risk of developing multiple myeloma. Medscape Medic...

items.title: EMA Recommends Rezdiffra for MASH Liver Fibrosis
items.description: The drug promotes lipophagy and hepatic fatty acid beta-oxidation to reduce liver fat, inflammation, and liver fibrosis. Medscape Medical News

items.title: FDA Approves Dupilumab for Bullous Pemphigoid
items.description: Treatment with dupilumab improved disease remission and significantly reduced itching compared with placebo. Medscape Medical News
